name: NSTV Prototype
description:
This was my 1st time ever touching the Unreal engine and the process ended up with me spending my time watching tutorials and trying to figure out how the engine worked. So this ‘prototype’ really just showcases one of the unique mechanics for this genre of games.

When your vehicle is destroyed you have 2 surviving crewmates(gunner & driver). You can switch between them at will. They can continue on fighting with their light anti-tank weapons. When they both die then you respawn in the vehicle.

Controls:

  1. WASD/ arrow keys to move
  2. Mouse to look around
  3. ‘E’ to “destroy” vehicle & switch to one of the surviving crew members
  4. ‘Q’ to switch between the 2 crew members
